thread.section_title: Executive Airport Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Entebbe, Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best price for your money
thread.title_full: Best price for your money - Review of Executive Airport Hotel, Entebbe, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: jylee3182
title: Best price for your money
text: I stayed at the Executive Airport Hotel my first night in Uganda. My flight arrived in the late evening so I decided to stay close to the airport rather than travel to Kampala after a day of flying. My stay was absolutely wonderful. The hotel was clean. The staff was very friendly. The internet was also very fast. I would definitely recommend staying here and will plan on staying here next time I travel over.
